B

BaseDirection - Enum in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
Specifies the base direction of a paragraph.
BidiAlgorithm - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
This class implements Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm available at http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr9.
BidiAlgorithm(String) - Constructor for class com.mta.tehreer.bidi.BidiAlgorithm
Constructs a bidi algorithm object for the given text.
BidiLine - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
A BidiLine object represents a single line processed with rules L1-L2 of Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm.
BidiPair - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
A BidiPair object provides the pair of a unicode code point at a specific index in source text.
BidiPairConsumer - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
Represents an operation that accepts a single BidiPair object and returns no result.
BidiPairConsumer() - Constructor for class com.mta.tehreer.bidi.BidiPairConsumer
 
BidiParagraph - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
A BidiParagraph object represents a single paragraph of text processed with rules X1-I2 of Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm.
BidiRun - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
A BidiRun object represents a sequence of characters which have the same embedding level.
BidiRunConsumer - Class in com.mta.tehreer.bidi
Represents an operation that accepts a single BidiRun object and returns no result.
BidiRunConsumer() - Constructor for class com.mta.tehreer.bidi.BidiRunConsumer
